author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nanjing Hicin Pharmaceutical to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 20
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Nanjing Hicin Pharmaceutical Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 2.50 yuan(before tax)/10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 5 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 19
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 20 and the dividend will be paid on April 20
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/MQ9Fzp
